query:
ALTER TABLE products 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS parentProductIdentifier VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS shipstationCost DECIMAL(10, 2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS manualCost DECIMAL(10, 2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS channelCosts JSON,
ADD INDEX IF NOT EXISTS parent_identifier_idx (parentProductIdentifier)
